name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of June 28, a fire broke out in Guiyang

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 28, the Suzhou Public Security Bureau issued a public notice that Hu Youping, a crew member who stood up to stop the suspect in the "June 24" Japanese school bus attack in Suzhou, Jiangsu, died on the 26th due to serious injuries. Suzhou City announced that he would be posthumously awarded the title of "Model of Righteous Acts of Bravery" in Suzhou City.
The Japanese Embassy in China lowered its flag to half-mast to pay tribute to her. It also said, "I believe her courage and kindness also represent the vast majority of Chinese people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the injured, when the suspect was committing the crime, Hu Youping stopped the suspect and was stabbed and fell to the ground, and the son of the Japanese adult victim took the opportunity to escape.
Citizens who witnessed the scene saw that Hu Youping first grabbed the suspect and then hugged the suspect from behind. The suspect stabbed her with his backhand, causing her to fall to the ground but continued to chase and stab her. She was subdued on the road by citizens, passing drivers and patrol police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 28, the Inner Mongolia police reported that Huo Wenchang was arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The key life of Chinese people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"I can defend the Diaoyu Islands, but I can't defend my homestead"
On June 27, Wang Qiang, who went to sea to defend the Diaoyu Islands in 2003 and has been engaged in "defending the Diaoyu Islands" and public welfare activities for many years, sent a Weibo post asking for help, saying that his homestead was forcibly occupied by someone to build a wall. He protested by going on a hunger strike and hoped that the government would give him a clear result.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some commentators believe that the fact that the official report deliberately avoided the truth about "Japanese" and "school bus" shows that "saving Japanese" is a controversial act in China.
The official deliberately wanted to downplay the impact of the incident, but ultimately caused a public opinion event due to insufficient narrative. People had to restore the facts through translated Japanese media reports.
People should know her deeds truthfully, which is the best way to commemorate her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 26, Shanghai.
US Ambassador to China Burns mentioned in his speech that China stood on the side of Russia in the Russo-Ukrainian war. Beijing's technical support to Russia on the Ukrainian issue was a "major mistake".

https://t.co/AbNFnUQD28

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: South Korea's National Intelligence Service said on the 27th that since the Chinese government will increase the national security agencies' authority to conduct temporary inspections of electronic devices starting next month, South Korean citizens in China must pay attention to the risks of using chat software and other applications banned in China through virtual private networks (VPN, wall-breaking software).
